Package ie.atu.sw

Class LoadFiles

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.LoadFiles
public class LoadFiles extends Object
Since:
1.8 LoadFiles class is responsible for loading dictionary and data files into maps and lists for encoding and decoding.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tomasz Touma

  • Method Details

    • loadDictionaryMap

      public void loadDictionaryMap(String mappingFile) throws Exception
      Reads the mapping file, gets it content and add the words into a hash map as a keys and their codes as a values, and if the key start with a @@ syntax, it add that key into a different map (suffix map ). Time Complexity: O(1)
      Parameters:
      mappingFile -
      Throws:
      Exception

    • loadDecodeDictionaryMap

      public void loadDecodeDictionaryMap(String mappingFile) throws Exception
      Reads the mapping file, gets its content and add the words into a hash map as a values and their codes as a keys for decoding. Time Complexity: O(1)
      Parameters:
      mappingFile -
      Throws:
      Exception
